infos.title: Shadow of Abyss
infos.like: Her sister Erze, strawberry parfait, fine swords and the moon
infos.dislike: Her sister as a vampire and spiders
infos.story: The 101st Heir of ShadowHilt and the sister of Erze. People call her cold-blooded for her unfriendly attitude, but she used to be all smiles when she was around her beloved sister, Erze. Seria always felt sorry for her feeble sister and was overprotective of her, without realizing that it was actually putting Erze in greater despair. One day, Erze fell into a trap during a mission. She was saved, but her sickness started to worsen dramatically. Meanwhile, Seria was sent to Windland Snow Moutain to follow the traces of the Vampire Princess. She had a glimpse of what was going on with her sister, but she left for the top-priority mission, praying that she was wrong. However, the tragedy struck the sisters is if mocking Seria's prayers.
infos.story_: The 101st Heir of ShadowHilt and the sister of Erze. People call her cold-blooded for her unfriendly attitude, but she used to be all smiles when she was around her beloved sister, Erze. Seria always felt sorry for her feeble sister and was overprotective of her, without realizing that it was actually putting Erze in greater despair. One day, Erze fell into a trap during a mission. She was saved, but her sickness started to worsen dramatically. Meanwhile, Seria was sent to Windland Snow Mountain to follow the traces of the Vampire Princess. She had a glimpse of what was going on with her sister, but she left for the top-priority mission, praying that she was wrong. However, the tragedy struck the sisters as if it mocking Seria's prayers. - Oh, my beloved sister, Seria! Seria returned to find the corpses of her comrades lying on the ground, cold as ice. Erze welcomed her with two sharp fangs, thirsting for blood. Seria trembled with waves of emotions. Her heart was breaking, yet she spoke in a cold, calm tone. - You... you are not my little sister anymore. You're a filthy bloodsucker.

uw.story: A sword of authority passed down to the masters of ShadowHilts. This sword contains the power of mighty beings that made a pact to serve the ShadowHilts. Some of them were Elementals, some were innocent spirits, and some even demons. It is known that tens of thousands of evil forces fell to this sword. It also has a demonic quality that binds the spirit of the slain evil to the blade. Despite its great power, fewer than 5 people in 600 years that were able to wield this sword. Seria, the 101st Heir of ShadowHilts and the only master in history chosen by the sword, entered the pact with the sword to put her beloved sister to rest.

1.story: An ominous whetstone known to hold the soul of a demon. Swords that contain a pact of servitude must be sharpened with this whetstone as ordinary ones won't work for them. Used with Enlightening Candlelight, Elsion's resistance against the Demons becomes maximized.

2.name: Ring of Abyss
2.description: [Blood Scattering Blade] Increases DMG by 50% and reduces M.Block of affected enemies by (0).
2.story: A silver ring that represents the ShadowHilts. Seria touches it whenever she feels her life is meaningless. Doing so would remind her of her dead comrades, filling her heart with the need for vengeance against her sister Erze. Ironically, the ring has a note written by Erze, hidden within the ring's jewel when she was young, but Seria still doesn't know about it.

3.name: Enlightening Candlelight
3.description: [Red Moon Blade] Gains immunity to CC for the duration of the skill. When the battle starts, increases DMG by 70% for (0) time.
3.story: The candle known to have been on the table of the meeting hall where ancient warriors from different continents gathered to defeat supernatural beings. Blazing on this old candle is a blue exorcising flame. When the flame touches an evil being, it sucks the vitality out of the creature's body. This is the first material Seria uses whenever she refines her sword.

4.name: Demonic Eight Trigrams

4.story: The Eight Trigrams that the first leader of Shadow Hilt Family received from a supernatural being. Only the leaders of Shadow Hilt can handle it and maximize the power of Elsion through the demonic energy stored inside. 8 different beasts that punished evil are sealed in the trigrams, and different forces arise based on whether each trigram is pointing to yin or yang. When all 8 trigrams point toward perfect yin, the full moon raised by the Cold Blooded Witch is redder than the thickest blood.

sw.story:
Zaunlang is an archfiend, one of the powerful entities that forged a familiar pact with the Shadow Hilt family.
It is known that its skill in blades surpasses its innate talent in sorcery.
Innate spiritual energy flows through the blade, blooming the purple cloud and dissipating the hallucinatory image of the enemy upon swinging.
As unique Zaunlang is, it does not lend its power to anyone, but it responded and lent its power to Seria when she swore to slay her blood sister, Erze.
